question: Biomass is defined as-
option1: Total organic matter existing in an ecosystem
option2: Total inorganic matter existing in an ecosystem
option3: Total organic and inorganic matter existing in an ecosystem
answer: Total organic matter existing in an ecosystem
explanation: Biomass refers to the total organic matter existing in an ecosystem. It consist of living or recently living material from plants and animals. It also consist of bio waste from home , medical use, industries etc.
